title: Excimer
author: Excimer
created_time: September 29, 2022, 05:05:16 AMLast edit: February 18, 2025, 01:43:50 PM by Excimer
content: AI-lobby should be stopped!Guys! A dangerous plague is approaching the forum. It is AI-posters. That bots should be stopped. Right now an AI-lobby is being forming which are trying to legalize AI on the forumTopic of AI-lobbistshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5530909

comments.author: Excimer
comments.body: Dear comrades! What will happen to our forum? We need to stop this AI-plague before it starts spreading.These AI-bots recently tried to spam my topics. As you can see, these AI technologies are quite a dangerous thingQuote from: Excimer on February 12, 2025, 12:01:17 PMAnother one AI-spammer who trying set me upRULE 3 ISNT REALhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3688192Quote from: Excimer on February 10, 2025, 02:42:29 PMThis guy is a 100% AI-bot. He doing spam-attack to my topicsXxXb1gB0ssXxXThe same puppeteer was behind these bots. He is a Poker Player. They appeared just after he realized that he couldn't counter my iron facts with any one argument

comments.author: Excimer
comments.created_time: March 04, 2025, 02:36:52 PMLast edit: March 04, 2025, 02:48:26 PM by Excimer
comments.body: Quote from: Free Market Capitalist on February 27, 2025, 07:02:02 PMSo basically, AI agents will learn to complete tasks in the digital world just like a human. This means that most of what you do on your computer or phone today, an AI agent will be able to do for you.Shut you f@cking mouth AI-lobbyist Poker Player. Get the f@ck away from normal people with your AI. I don't want everyone on the forum to turn into AI-posters. I don't want to communicate with AI-bots here neither now nor in the futureI'm for organic content. This is forum. With real live users. Not some kind of burp like twitter with botsQuote from: Free Market Capitalist on March 04, 2025, 02:18:48 PMAI improves with every passing second, non-stop.
